snippet: Rev. Moody was a church leader who hurled himself and his Greenwich Village congregation into roiling social issues.
abstract: Rev Howard R Moody, longtime minister of the historic Judson Memorial Church in Manhattan's Greenwich Village, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Rev. Moody was a church leader who hurled himself and his Greenwich Village congregation into roiling social issues.

headline.seo: Howard Moody, Minister of Judson Memorial Church, Dead at 91
headline.main: Howard Moody, Who Led a Historic Church, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Howard Moody, 91; Led a Historic Church
